meanings.definition: A person who eats a meal.
meanings.sent1: The hungry comer enjoyed a delicious dinner.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered around the table as the comer savored each bite.
meanings.sent3: The little comer made a mess with spaghetti, but it was a fun sight.
meanings.sent4: The buffet was a paradise for the hungry comer, offering endless options.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked bread drew the comer to the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A person who arrives at a place.
meanings.sent1: The late comer rushed into the theater just as the lights dimmed.
meanings.sent2: The new comer to the party greeted everyone with a warm smile.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected comer at the meeting caused a stir among the attendees.
meanings.sent4: The early morning sun welcomed the first comer to the park.
meanings.sent5: The last comer to the bus stop missed the bus by mere seconds.

meanings.definition: A person who is making progress in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The young comer in the art world impressed everyone with their unique style.
meanings.sent2: The talented comer in the music industry released a chart-topping album.
meanings.sent3: The rising comer in the business sector had innovative ideas that caught attention.
meanings.sent4: The promising comer in the sports arena showed great potential for success.
meanings.sent5: The ambitious comer in the science community was dedicated to their research.
